articles.title: Greetings to Seychellois President
articles.content:
Greetings to Seychellois President
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Wednesday sent a message of greetings to James Alix Michel, President of Seychelles, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, Kim in the message wished the President good health and greater success in his noble work for stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Galego Montano gave a reception at the Cuban embassy on June 16 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Thae Jong, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated
Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea at the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday to mark the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Secretary of the C.C., the WPK Kim Jung Rin was among the attendants.
					
					 The reporter and speakers recalled that Kim Jong Il designated President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea and the Juche idea as the guiding idea of the revolution in the present era, put forward an original line on modeling the whole party on the Juche idea and developed the WPK into the Party of the President.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun policy as the main political mode under socialism as required by the developing revolution and increased the militant function and role of the party organizations, augmenting the political and military might of the country, they said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has defended socialism with his experienced and seasoned leadership, thereby demonstrating the honor and dignity of the country and the nation and building tremendous national power, and unfolded a new history of building of a great prosperous and powerful nation by arousing the entire army and all people, they pointed out, adding that these exploits would shine long in history.
					
					 They called on all officials, workers and members of the trade union to create a speed of the general advance in the Songun era, holding high the torch of a new great revolutionary surge kindled by Kim Jong Il, and thus contribute to glorifying this year as a year of a decisive turn in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Chinese Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Chinese Held
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting took place at East Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 on Wednesday to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the birth of the "Mao Zedong Class".
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation of the "Kim Il Sung Class" of Beijing Middle School No. 5 in China led by Principal Shang Jinhua and Ambassador Liu Xiaoming and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 On hand were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, officials concerned and teachers and students of the "Mao Zedong Class" at East Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting noted that the exchange between the "Mao Zedong Class" and the "Kim Il Sung Class" at Beijing Middle School No. 5 has contributed to developing the friendly relations between youth and children of the DPRK and China over the past 50 years since the emergence of the "Mao Zedong Class".
					
					 Saying that next year is a significant year marking the 60th anniversary of the birth of the "Kim Il Sung Class", they expressed belief that the DPRK-China friendship provided by President Kim Il Sung and Chairman Mao Zedong would be strengthened and developed in the future, too.
					
					 The participants appreciated an art performance of students of the secondary school and conversed with each other.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, they went round classrooms and laboratories of the school.
					
					 That day the staff members of the Chinese embassy presented a photo of Kim Il Sung meeting with Mao Zedong and educational equipment to the school.

articles.title: Children's Films Newly Released
articles.content:
Children's Films Newly Released
Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean April 26 Children's Film Studio has of late released new films for children.
					The film "Small and Large Wild Insam" is based on a folktale told by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. The story revolves on old man Kim who let his child eat a small root of wild insam (ginseng) suitable to his age and avaricious Pak, a petty official, who let his child eat a big one which made him a fool. It tells that one should administer a medicine according to age and one might make a mess of the matter when one is ignorant.
					
					"Kind Heart," part four of the puppet film "Red Star," portrays a child who teases a friend clumsy at singing and a child who helps the friend amend his shortcomings. It tells that one should always love and help one's friends.
					
					The film "Winged Ants" shows the truth that knowledge is strength and one should gain it by studying hard and only then can one win the fight with the enemy through a story of ants beating wolf spiders by taking advantage of  wind blowing from a ravine.

articles.title: Korean Documentary Film Screened
articles.content:
Korean Documentary Film Screened
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- A Korean documentary film "The Great Leader Steering the Building of a Great Prosperous Powerful Nation to Victory" (part on political and ideological power) was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The film deals with the historic scenes showing that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power with his tirelessly energetic leadership, holding high the banner of Songun during the "Arduous March" and the forced march.
					
					 It tells about the undying feats of the leader who brought about epoch-making changes in the revolution and construction by dint of the socialist idea by training the Korean People's Army to be an army strong in ideology and faith and guiding all the people to follow the indomitable fighting spirit of the revolutionary army.
					
					 It also deals with the impressive scenes showing that many models in devotedly defending the leader and performers of heroic merits emerged since the revolutionary soldier spirit and the Kanggye spirit prevailed all over the society and the torches of Songgang and Ranam were kindled by the inexhaustible mental power of the army and the people.
					
					 Watching the film were senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Developing Soybean Food
articles.content:
Developing Soybean Food
Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of soybean foodstuffs made with new soybean processing technologies was held in Pyongyang recently.
					Exhibited there were scores of kinds of soybean foodstuffs including sweet steamed ground bean bread and nutritive-stuffed bun.
					
					The exhibits, highly nutritious without raw-soybean taste, were recognized as ideal macrobiotic foodstuffs.
					
					In particular new food materials made with soybean attracted the gaze of visitors which are mixed well with vegetables, meat and other food materials.
					
					The Korean people, who have used soybean food from ancient times, are now diversifying dietary life with soybean foodstuffs including bean curd and bean sprouts.
					
					Officials and cooks of public catering establishments and housewives across the country are striving to process soybean food on a scientific basis to suit its developing trend.
					
					The food-processing factories are turning out soy and bean paste, soybean soup, bean flour products and other foodstuffs and the bean-milk and soybean processing factories built in different parts of the country are producing bean-milk for nurseries, kindergartens and primary and secondary schools.

articles.title: Profitable Metal Surface Treatment Technology
articles.content:
Profitable Metal Surface Treatment Technology
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- New metal surface treatment technology is widely introduced in various sectors of the national economy in the DPRK.
					 The products made with advanced metal surface treatment technology developed by researchers of the Central Machine Designing Institute under the Ministry of Machine-Building Industry are applied to many fields including metal processing and machine-building.
					
					 In order to meet the requirements of the reality in which the metal surface treatment technology is applied to more and more fields, the research team has developed new technology of making surface treatment matters of various uses with local materials and has applied it to practice.
					
					 The Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, the Taean Heavy Machine Complex, the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex and various other units have introduced the technology, with result that they have improved the mechanical character of facilities and considerably reduced the production cost.
					
					 Noteworthy is it that a factory removed the intermediate heat treatment process and raised the overall production efficiency by introducing the technology.
					
					 Many units in the mining industry applied the technology to crank bush of oxygen compressor, the main shaft bush of excavator and machine parts, thus economizing plenty of nonferrous metals and extending their serviceable life far more.
					
					 The economic effectiveness of the metal surface treatment technology is growing in the course of its application.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Advice to Officials to Be Faithful Servants of People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Advice to Officials to Be Faithful Servants of People
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- One day in December Juche 34 (1945), Kim Jong Suk, the anti-Japanese heroine, met with officials of Myongchon County, North Hamgyong Province and asked them about the living conditions of the people in the county.
					 One of them told her pessimistically about their hard lot. She made a searching inquiry about the real living of the people.
					
					 He mumbled there were people making meals of pine bark and wearing hemp clothes, but there was no help.
					
					 The longer she listened to them, whose words, attire and demeanor appeared rather "bureaucratic", the heavier she felt in the heart.
					
					 Quoting the words of President Kim Il Sung that an official, wherever he may work and whatever he may do, should devote his all efforts and wisdom to the interests of the country, the people and the revolution, she said these words were the guideline which should be cherished deep in the mind of all the officials serving the people.
					
					 Her words moved the officials, making them regret deeply the mistakes in their attitude toward the people.

articles.title: U.S. Rebuked for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S. Rebuked for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war by massively deploying aggressor armed forces in south Korea and in its vicinity right after it prodded the UNSC into adopting an extremely provocative "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its legitimate nuclear test for self-defence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists decided to deliver to the south Korean puppets bombs to be used for destroying the underground facilities while reinforcing and deploying ultra-modern war hardware including unmanned reconnaissance plane and F-22 in U.S. forces bases in south Korea and Japan.
					
					 The U.S. is leaving no means untried to suffocate the DPRK by force of arms, while desperately pursuing its hostile policy towards it.
					
					 The U.S. which had designated the DPRK as its target of "nuclear attack" already under the preceding regime is now making haste to put its scenario to invade the DPRK into practice under the pretext of its nuclear test. The situation on the Korean Peninsula is so tense that a war may break out any moment. 
					
					 It is not because of someone's "threat" that the U.S. is deploying new type ultra-modern war hardware in south Korea and in its vicinity.
					
					Aggressors require a pretext for igniting a war. It is, therefore, a trite method for them to launch a military action once the pretext is given to them. 
					
					The U.S. still regards it as a main element of its foreign military strategy to mount a preemptive attack on those countries which it put on the list of the "axis of evil" and bring them under its control.
					
					 It is the independent mode of the DPRK's counter-action to decisively counter the enemy's "confrontation" with all-out confrontation. If the U.S. imperialists get so keen to invade the DPRK and start a war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost, this will only lead them to the abyss of self-destruction. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to give up its ambition to seize the DPRK by force of arms and act with reason.

articles.title: U.S. and Japan Wholly Blame for Threat and Spread of Nukes
articles.content:
U.S. and Japan Wholly Blame for Threat and Spread of Nukes
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed by Tokyo Shimbun that a secret agreement on the introduction of nuclear weapons under which the U.S. and Japan agreed to connive at the entry into Japan by any U.S. warship or plane carrying nuclear weapons during the revision of the Japan-U.S. Security Pact in 1960 has been continuously handled by high-ranking officials of the Japanese Foreign Ministry including its permanent under-secretary and it still remains valid. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 This once again clearly proves that the "three non-nuclear principles" and the "nuclear disarmament" much touted by the Japanese reactionaries and the U.S. are nothing but sheer sophism and they are entirely to blame for the threat and spread of nuclear weapons.
					
					  The commentary cites facts to prove that the Japanese reactionaries have so far paid lip-service to "peace" before others, while claiming that "there was no secret agreement on nukes" between Japan and the U.S. while frantically accelerating the moves to go nuclear in a bid to invade other countries.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The recent disclosure of the secret agreement between Japan and the U.S. brought into bolder relief the despicable true colors of the U.S. as the chief culprit of nuclear threat and proliferation. 
					
					 The danger of a nuclear war to the world is coming from such countries as the U.S. and Japan more talkative about "peace," "nuclear disarmament" and "nuclear non-proliferation" than any other countries. 
					
					  Nukes are, by no means, a monopoly of the U.S. 
					
					 Should the U.S. and its followers dare infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK even a bit, the army and the people of the DPRK will retaliate against them a thousand times with merciless military blows.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Arms Buildup Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Arms Buildup Flayed
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are getting frantic in the moves to ship more latest war hardware into south Korea to attack the DPRK in conspiracy with outside forces under the pretext of the measures taken by the DPRK to bolster up its war deterrent for self-defence. This is a very dangerous provocative move to drive the already strained inter-Korean relations and military tension to a point of explosion.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It is shameless for the puppets to step up their arms buildup at an unprecedented tempo under the pretext of the above-said measures of the DPRK, the commentary notes.
					
					 It cites facts to prove that the U.S. and its puppet Lee Myung Bak regime are entirely to blame for the present grave tension on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 It should not be overlooked under any circumstances that the puppets are kicking up a racket for introducing more ultra-modern war hardware to south Korea at a time when they have become evermore undisguised in their moves to hurt fellow countrymen by force of arms, backed by outside forces, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is making bluffing, while frantically pursuing confrontation and a war against the DPRK, counting on its U.S. master. This reminds one of a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					Neither "U.S. military protection" on which the Lee group of traitors pins so strong hope nor latest weapons would prove effective in face of the powerful military power of the DPRK, a product of the Songun politics.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to stop its reckless military provocations, bearing in mind that its arms buildup would only lead to self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Forces' Loudmouthed "Threat from North" Snubbed
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Forces' Loudmouthed "Threat from North" Snubbed
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling forces are now becoming vociferous about "threat from the north". This is nothing but sheer sophism to cover up the true nature of their moves to ignite a war of aggression and the evermore growing danger of invasion against the north resulting from them. 
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 All the successive dictators of south Korea made much ado as if something serious would happen right now while spreading a wild rumor about "threat of southward invasion" but everything turned out to be an anti-DPRK farce as it ended up with sheer lies, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The threat that has actually existed on the Korean Peninsula is the threat of invasion against the north posed by the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 No one can vouch that war exercises involving not only huge forces of the U.S. forces in south Korea and the puppet army but the aggressor forces from the U.S. mainland and overseas bases ceaselessly staged in south Korea will not go over to a real war against the DPRK anytime.
					
					 Peace is preserved on the Korean Peninsula despite the touch and go situation prevailing there. This is entirely thanks to the DPRK's powerful war deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK values peace but will deal resolute and merciless blows at the enemies coming in attack on it.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to clearly understand that their moves for confrontational war against the DPRK under the deceptive signboard of "threat from the north" will bring disgraceful destruction to them.

articles.title: UNSC Urged to Retract Its "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
UNSC Urged to Retract Its "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea released on June 14 a statement titled "The United Nations Security Council, immediately withdraw its 'resolution on sanctions' against the north."
					 The statement said that the above-said resolution of the UNSC would only help escalate the confrontation and tension between the south and the north, far from finding a solution to the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 If the UNSC truly stands for a peaceful solution of the nuclear issue on the peninsula, it should withdraw its illegal "resolution on sanctions." The U.S., Japan and the Lee Myung Bak "government" should stop their racket for aggression and roll back their hostile policy towards the north.
					
					 If the Lee regime opts to play the role of a shock brigade in implementing the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK which will bring dark clouds of war to hang on the peninsula in a bid to weather its political crisis, it will not escape a stern judgment of the nation and the people.
					
					 The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration will always take the lead in the actions to denounce the above-mentioned resolution of the UNSC, put an end to confrontation and tension on the peninsula and achieve reconciliation and peace.
					
					 Meanwhile, the organization on Monday issued a statement titled "Let's defend the June 15 joint declaration through a struggle to force the Lee Myung Bak regime to step down" on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: All People Called upon to Implement Inter-Korean Declarations
articles.content:
All People Called upon to Implement Inter-Korean Declarations
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Organizations of the reunification movement of south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, youth and students and human rights organizations held a "ceremony of declaring the period of the movement for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration for independent reunification, peace and prosperity" in Seoul on June 14.
					 Recalling that the dark clouds of a war are now heavily hanging over the Korean Peninsula, speakers at the ceremony accused the U.S. of sticking to its high-handed policy towards the DPRK and posing a threat to it. 
					
					 They assailed the Lee Myung Bak "government" for having brought the inter-Korean relations to total collapse by escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen, pursuant to the U.S. policy.
					
					 They urged the Lee regime to drop its policy of confrontation with the DPRK and implement the above-said declarations.
					
					 Then, a declaration was read out at the ceremony. It said that the present reality clearly indicates that there can be neither national reunification nor peace and prosperity of the nation without the implementation of the joint declarations.
					
					 The declaration noted that during the period of the movement the organizations would dynamically wage the reunification movement including information service aimed to preserve and implement the inter-Korean declarations to the last.
					
					 The declaration evinced the resolution of the people from all walks of life to unite irrespective of affiliation and stand and struggle to have the fascist laws including the "National Security Law" and the policy of confrontation with compatriots repealed.
					
					 If the Lee group insists on confrontation and war in disregard of the demand of the nation, all the people will turn out in the movement for forcing the "government" of traitors to step down, it warned.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Rejected
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Rejected
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on June 14 in support of the DPRK Foreign Ministry's statement released as regards the fact that at the instigation of the U.S., the United Nations Security Council finally adopted a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its second nuclear test.
					 Recalling that in the Foreign Ministry's statement the DPRK scathingly denounced and rejected the UNSC "resolution 1874" and solemnly declared it would take resolute countermeasures at this early phase of all-out confrontation with the U.S. in order to defend the national dignity and the country's sovereignty, the statement said:
					
					 The situation of acute confrontation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula was sparked off by unlawful strong-arm actions of the U.S. and its obedient UNSC in denial of the legitimate right of a sovereign state to launch satellites.
					
					 In essence, this confrontation is an issue related to the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK rather than an issue related to peace and security, and it is the DPRK-U.S. confrontation.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Korean residents in China fully support the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and will make every possible effort to implement it.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-reunification Forces under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-reunification Forces under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Leading members of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration including its Chairperson Jo Yun Hae and Koreans in Uzbekistan held roundtable talks on June 10 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak puppet group for its moves to eliminate the forces supporting  the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The participants referred to such tragedy as the suicide committed by former south Korean "President" Roh Moo Hyun on May 23, declaring that it was none other than puppet traitor Lee Myung Bak who forced Roh Moo Hyun into death. 
					
					 They recalled that as the spirit of national independence and the desire to achieve reunification through alliance with the north grew stronger after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, Lee Myung Bak, much upset and displeased with this, ran the whole gamut of accusations against Roh Moo Hyun, branding him as "a Red who drained resources for the north" and "a spokesman for the Workers' Party of the north."
					
					 The Lee group's such base act as driving Roh to death, who signed the north-south declaration, was a politically motivated revenge on the forces desirous of achieving independent reunification through alliance with the north and an unprecedentedly brutal action to totally scrap the historic north-south declarations and eliminate the forces which support them, they charged.
					
					 Noting that the June 15 joint declaration is a great programme of the nation for reunification and the October 4 declaration is a programme for implementing it, they stressed that south Korea cannot get rid of mayhem, crisis, uneasiness and horror and the inter-Korean relations cannot be improved as long as such murderers, fascist dictators and anti-reunification and confrontational maniacs like the Lee group lord it over.
					
					 The Lee group can never evade the responsibility for Roh Moo Hyun's tragic death and Lee should step down at once, they declared.

articles.title: Anniversary of Inter-Korean Declaration Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Inter-Korean Declaration Observed
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Japan Regional Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration sponsored a meeting in Tokyo on June 13 to mark the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Addressing the meeting, Kwak Tong Ui, chairman of the committee, charged that the Lee Myung Bak "government" in south Korea recently drove the former "president" to death, not content with having strangled democracy and deteriorated the people's livelihood by engaging itself in the fascist dictatorial rule against the people.
					
					 The Lee group is putting the inter-Korean relations on the war situation while inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north, he pointed out, contending that no matter how desperately the anti-reunification forces may try, they can not quench the entire nation's desire for reunification.
					
					 He called upon all Korean residents to turn out in the struggle for defending and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 An action program, to be carried out in the "period of movement for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration," was announced at the meeting.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, there was a lecture.
					
					 Meanwhile, the 3rd general meeting of the said committee took place.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Mexico and a lecture in India on May 29 and June 1 on the occasions of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 12th anniversary of the publication of his work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction".
					 Juan Campos Vega, chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, said at the seminar that Kim Jong Il has strengthened the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and an ever-victorious iron-willed party by energetically conducting the ideological and theoretical activities in 45 years of his work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 His work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" is a precious ideological asset as it provided the almighty treasure sword for victoriously advancing the revolution and construction and achieving the independent development of a nation, and it is displaying its great vitality with each passing day, he noted.
					
					 The secretary general of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung said in the lecture that the reality of the DPRK proves that preserving the Juche character and national character is a true way for carving out the destiny of each country and nation.

articles.title: Encuentro de amistad en la Escuela Secundaria No.1 de Pyongyang Este
articles.content:
Encuentro de amistad en la Escuela Secundaria No.1 de Pyongyang Este
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en la Escuela Secundaria No. 1 de Pyongyang Este el encuentro de amistad dedicado al 50o aniversario del nombramiento del "Grupo Mao Zedong".
					  A la ocasion fueron invitados los miembros de la delegacion del "Grupo Kim Il Sung" de la Escuela Secundaria No.5 de Beijing, China, encabezada por su director, Shang Jinhua, el embajador Liu Xiaoming y otros miembros de la embajada china en Corea.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes Jon Yong Jin, vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y del Comite Central de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-China, y otros funcionarios, los profesores y alumnos del "Grupo Mao Zedong".
					
					 Los oradores se refirieron a que durante 50 anos desde la denominacion de este grupo, el intercambio entre este y el "Grupo Kim Il Sung" vino contribuyendo al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre los jovenes y ninos de ambos paises.
					
					 El proximo ano es el significativo en que se acogera el 60o aniversario del nombramiento del "Grupo Kim Il Sung", senalaron y expresaron la conviccion de que seguira fortaleciendose y desarrollandose la amistad Corea-China preparada por esos ilustres lideres de los dos paises.
					
					  Acto seguido, los participantes vieron la funcion artistica de los alumnos de la escuela coreana y sostuvieron conversaciones.
					
					 Con anterioridad, ellos recorrieron las aulas y laboratorios.
					
					 Este dia, los miembros de la embajada china entregaron a la escuela una foto, que muestra el encuentro entre el Presidente Kim Il Sung y su homologo Mao Zedong, y donaron los equipos didacticos.

articles.title: EE.UU. agrava situacion en Corea, senala Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. agrava situacion en Corea, senala Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos instigo al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU a aprobar la provocativa "resolucion de la sancion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cuestionando la justa prueba nuclear autodefensiva de esta y seguidamente traslado a sus vastas fuerzas armadas agresivas al Sur de Corea y sus contornos llevado asi la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al punto de explosion.
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 17 y continua:
					
					  EE.UU. emplazo de nuevo el avion de reconocimiento sin piloto, el caza "F-22" y otros  equipos belicos de punta en sus bases militares en el Sur de Corea y Japon. Por otra parte, decidio entregar a los titeres surcoreanos las bombas capaces de destruir las instalaciones subterraneas.
					
					  El imperio hace mas abierta la politica hostil a la RPDC y se vale de todos los medos y metodos para aplastar en lo militar a la RPDC.
					
					  EE.UU., que ya en la epoca de la administracion anterior definio a la RPDC como el objeto del "ataque nuclear", se precipita a llevar a la practica el plan de agresion contra la RPDC con motivo de la prueba nuclear de esta.
					
					  Tambien introduce nuevas armas de punta en la Peninsula Coreana tan tensa y sus contornos, lo cual no se debe a la "amenaza" de alguien. A  los agresores  se les necesita el pretexto para desatar la guerra. Si una vez adquirido el pretexto, pasan a las acciones militares. Eso es el metodo rutinario de ellos.
					
					 EE.UU. presenta como lo principal de su estrategia militar exterior controlar a los paises calificados del "eje del mal" mediante el ataque preventivo contra ellos.
					
					   La RPDC mantiene el modo de contramedida independiente de responder rotundamente con el enfrentamiento total a la "confrontacion" de los enemigos. 
					
					  Si EE.UU. desata por fin la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, se hundira profundamente en la trampa de su ruina.
					
					  Debe abandonar su ambicion de atacar con la fuerza la RPDC y actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela el tratado secreto EE.UU.-Japon sobre armas nucleares
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela el tratado secreto EE.UU.-Japon sobre armas nucleares
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ATCC) -- El periodico japones "Tokyo Shimbun" trascendio que el subsecretario general y otros funcionarios de alto rango del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Japon vinieron manejando el tratado secreto de la introduccion de armas nucleares, que sigue vigente hasta hoy.
					Segun ese tratado contraido en 1960 durante la enmienda del Tratado de Seguridad Japon-Estados Unidos, este pais isleno se acordo con permitir en silencio la entrada en su territorio nacional de los buques de guerra o aeronaves norteamericanos cargados de armas nucleares, precisa el rotativo japones.
					
					Al respecto, el periodico Minju Joson difundio en su edicion de este miercoles un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Ese reporte comprueba una vez mas que no pasan de ser una sofisteria los "3 principios de la desnuclearizacion" y el "desarme nuclear", de que hablan tanto los reaccionarios japoneses y EE.UU., y que estos son responsables principales de la amenaza y proliferacion de armas nucleares.
					
					Hay de sobra los datos reveladores de que los reaccionarios japoneses, que hasta ahora se hacian el sueco insistiendo en que "no hubo el tratado secreto nuclear" entre su pais y EE.UU., aceleran demencialmente, detras del vistoso cartel de la "paz", el armamento nuclear para agredir a otros paises.
					
					El peligro de la guerra nuclear, que amenaza hoy al mundo, proviene de EE.UU., Japon y otros paises que hablan mas que nadie de la "paz", el "desarme nuclear" y la "no proliferacion nuclear".
					
					Las armas nucleares ya no son un medio monopolizado por EE.UU.
					
					Si EE.UU. y sus satelites se atreven a violar la soberania de la RPDC, el ejercito y el pueblo de ella les asestaran el implacable ataque militar.

articles.title: Rumor de "amenaza del Norte" es pura mentira, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Rumor de "amenaza del Norte" es pura mentira, insiste Rodong Sinmun 
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ATCC) -- El rumor de la "amenaza proveniente del Norte de Corea", que difunden los gobernantes surcoreanos, no pasa de ser una sofisteria para disimular la esencia de su campana para desatar la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea, cuya peligrosidad crece cada dia mas, asi revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado el dia 17 y continua:
					Todos los dictadores surcoreanos habian armado escandalos circulando el rumor de la supuesta "amenaza de agresion al Sur de Corea". Pero, quedo evidenciado que eso fue un complot anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea penetrado de mentiras de punta a cabo.
					
					Al reves, la amenaza realmente existente en la Peninsula Coreana proviene historicamente de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Por ejemplo, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, el grueso del ejercito titere surcoreano y las fuerzas armadas de refuerzo procedentes del territorio norteamericano y las bases en ultramar libran sin cesar en la extension geografica del Sur de Corea los ejercicios belicos de toda indole.
					
					No hay ninguna garantia de que estas maniobras militares no se conviertan en la guerra de verdad contra la RPDC.
					
					Gracias al poderoso disuasivo de guerra de la RPDC para la autodefensa, se mantiene la paz en la Peninsula Coreana pese a la aguda situacion a punto de explosion.
					
					Si bien la RPDC aprecia mucho la paz, respondera con una represalia resuelta e implacable a los enemigos que se abalancen esgrimiendo el sable para atropellarla.
					
					La banda de Lee debe saber bien que su campana de confrontacion y guerra contra la RPDC, que se libra bajo el enganoso rotulo de la "amenaza proveniente del Norte", le adelantara su vergonzosa autodestruccion.
